title: Coronavirus Cases Are Rising Among Children in South African Hospitals
content: The increase, observed in children’s wards at two major hospitals in South Africa, points to increased community transmission, doctors say.

title: What Data Shows About Vaccine Supply and Demand in the Most Vulnerable Places
content: Among the least vaccinated countries, some have used nearly all of the Covid vaccine doses available to them, while others have been able to distribute just a fraction of their available doses.

title: Where the Despairing Log On, and Learn Ways to Die
content: It has the trappings of popular social media, a young audience and explicit content on suicide that other sites don’t allow. It is linked to a long line of lives cut short.

title: Ukraine Commanders Say a Russian Invasion Would Overwhelm Them
